trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events defined on <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供上定義之事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: HtmlElementEventArgs encapsulates the same information found on the `window.event` object when programming against the unmanaged HTML DOM or when writing Active Script for HTML pages.
trans-unit.target: HtmlElementEventArgs 封裝上找到的相同資訊`window.event`針對未受管理的 HTML DOM 程式設計或者寫入 HTML 頁面的使用中指令碼時的物件。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, you can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ToElement%2A> to find the HTML element that is receiving the event action, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.FromElement%2A> to find the HTML element that the current event is causing us to leave.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ToElement%2A>尋找 HTML 項目接收事件的動作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.FromElement%2A>尋找 HTML 項目目前的事件造成我們保持。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.FromElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ToElement%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, not every event supplies a value for these properties; see the managed documentation for an event, or the corresponding documentation in the Internet Explorer SDK documentation, to discover if the event supplies it.
trans-unit.target: 不過，並非每個事件都提供這些屬性; 的值請參閱事件的受管理的文件或 Internet Explorer SDK 文件中，以探索事件提供該對應的文件。

trans-unit.source: Many events in the HTML DOM are sent to their parent elements unless they are cancelled.
trans-unit.target: HTML DOM 中的許多事件會傳送至其父項目中，除非他們取消。

trans-unit.source: This is known as event bubbling.
trans-unit.target: 這稱為事件反昇。

trans-unit.source: If a `SPAN` inside of a `DIV` receives a click, then a click event is raised for the `SPAN` first, then for the `DIV`, and finally for the HTML page's `BODY` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果`SPAN`內`DIV`接收按一下，然後按一下事件的引發`SPAN`第一次，然後針對`DIV`，最後再 HTML 網頁`BODY`項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> controls whether an event will behave in this manner or not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>控制是否事件行為將會以這種方式與否。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the ALT key was pressed when this event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指出此事件發生時，是否已按下 ALT 鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> is the ALT key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>是已按下 ALT 鍵。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current event bubbles up through the element hierarchy of the HTML Document Object Model.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在目前事件反昇到 HTML 文件物件模型的項目階層。

trans-unit.source: Not all events in the Document Object Model bubble.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有的文件物件模型泡泡圖中的事件。

trans-unit.source: All of the events exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> managed wrapper bubble with the exception of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.Stop>.
trans-unit.target: 所有的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>managed 包裝函式泡泡，除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.Stop>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.Stop></xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>所公開的事件

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>, the `Error` and `Load` events do not bubble.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>、`Error`和`Load`事件不會反昇。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>

trans-unit.source: Setting `BubbleEvent` to `true` during any of these events will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 設定`BubbleEvent`至`true`在任何這些事件會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event bubbles; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it does not.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件反昇。，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果不存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor in the document's client area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在文件的工作區中的滑鼠游標的位置。

trans-unit.source: `ClientMousePosition` gives the mouse position of the cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the document.
trans-unit.target: `ClientMousePosition`提供滑鼠游標的位置相對於文件的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.MousePosition%2A> if you need the mouse coordinates relative to the element that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.MousePosition%2A>如果您需要引發事件的項目相對滑鼠座標。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.MousePosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current position of the mouse cursor.
trans-unit.target: 將滑鼠游標目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the CTRL key was pressed when this event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指出此事件發生時，是否已按下 CTRL 鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the CTRL key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果按下 CTRL 鍵。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the event that was raised.
trans-unit.target: 取得引發之事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> the mouse pointer is moving away from.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>滑鼠指標位於離開的移動。

trans-unit.source: FromElement will have a valid value during mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave>.
trans-unit.target: FromElement 必須是有效的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave></xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter>例如滑鼠事件期間

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> the mouse pointer is moving away from.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"> </xref>滑鼠指標位於離開的移動。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ASCII value of the keyboard character typed in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyPress"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyDown"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得輸入鍵盤字元的 ASCII 值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyPress"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyDown"> </xref>，或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The ASCII value of the composed keyboard entry.
trans-unit.target: ASCII 值組成的鍵盤項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the mouse button that was clicked during a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseDown"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 取得滑鼠按鈕已按下期間<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseDown"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The mouse button that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 已按下滑鼠按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor relative to a relatively positioned parent element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相對於相對位置的父項的滑鼠游標的位置。

trans-unit.source: Relative positioning is used in HTML to place an element on a page in relation to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 相對位置會在 HTML 中放入元素在頁面上，相對於其父代。

trans-unit.source: If an element is relatively positioned, this property will return the same result as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ClientMousePosition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果相對位置的項目，這個屬性會傳回與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ClientMousePosition%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ClientMousePosition%2A>相同的結果

trans-unit.source: The position of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the parent of the element that raised the event, if the parent element is relatively positioned.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件，如果父項目而言具有相對位置的項目父代的左上角相對的滑鼠游標的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the mouse cursor relative to the element that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定引發事件的項目相對的滑鼠游標的位置。

trans-unit.source: The mouse position relative to the element that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件的項目相對的滑鼠位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the return value of the handled event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定處理事件的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已處理的事件。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the SHIFT key was pressed when this event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指出此事件發生時，是否已按下 SHIFT 鍵。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the SHIFT key was pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果按下 SHIFT 鍵;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref> toward which the user is moving the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement"></xref>到其使用者移動滑鼠指標。

trans-unit.source: ToElement will have a valid value during mouse events such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave>.
trans-unit.target: ToElement 必須是有效的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseLeave></xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.MouseEnter>例如滑鼠事件期間

trans-unit.source: The element toward which the mouse pointer is moving.
trans-unit.target: 移動滑鼠指標位於到這個項目。
